Key Match Events: Anastasios Bakasetas scored in the second half, breaking the deadlock.
Petros Mantalos secured the second goal for Greece in the dying moments of the game.
Post-Match Reflections: Despite Caoimhin Kelleher's inspired first-half performance, he made a big error in the dying moments of the game, leading to Greece's second goal.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Republic of Ireland faced Greece at the Georgios Karaiskaki Stadium.
The match was part of the UEFA Nations League 2024-2025 season.
The Republic of Ireland faces Finland next and then Wembley Stadium for a rematch against England.
